about_the_game: Kick it old school with character skins based on the original Super Monkey Ball game. This pack includes character skins for AiAi, MeeMee, Baby, GonGon, YanYan and Doctor.
detailed_description: Kick it old school with character skins based on the original Super Monkey Ball game. This pack includes character skins for AiAi, MeeMee, Baby, GonGon, YanYan and Doctor.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 8.1 64bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX550Ti or Radeon HD 5770
  • Storage: 11 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10 64bits
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 or higher

  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX750Ti or Radeon HD 7770
